Good Comments: Несмотря на небольшое отставание группы от sstyle, текст перевода на мой взгляд вышел лучше, да и оформление .ass-сабов радует глаз

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei

Good Comments: The [Nipaa] ones are really good although not HD. Dunno about [Nipaa~]
Their subbing is nothing short of spectacular.They make subs easy to read and understand without makeing it too long.
Bad Comments: Ni-paa~ > Tomodachi. Though TMD has better karaoke. Also TMD's 'Sea Bear' > Nipa's 'Little Bro'
Great translation, was much more understandable than TMD.
